description.message: Capture visible content of a tab, a region of a web page, or the whole page as a PNG image. Support horizontal and vertical scroll when capturing whole page, with an all new autosave capability.
description.description: Description of the extension, which appears in the gallery and Chrome extension management UI

special_title.message: This is a special page. Unable to perform screen capture actions on this page.
special_title.description: Browser action tooltip text, shown for special pages.

loading_title.message: The page is loading, please wait.
loading_title.description: Browser action tooltip text, shown when the page is loading.

capture_window.description: The 1st menu item in browser action popup, meaning capture visible content of a tab.

capture_area.description: The 2nd menu item in browser action popup, meaning capture a region of a web page.

capture_webpage.description: The 3rd menu item in browser action popup, meaning capture the whole page.

loading.description: The loading message in browser action popup, shown when capturing the whole page.

highlight.description: The 1st button in image editing toolbar, meaning highlight an area in the image.

border.description: The 1st menu item in Highlight menu.

rect.description: The 2nd menu item in Highlight menu.

redact.description: The 2nd button in image editing toolbar, meaning redact an area in the image.

solid_black.description: The 1st menu item in Redact menu.

blur.description: The 2nd menu item in Redact menu.

text.description: The 3rd button in image editing toolbar, meaning add text in the image.

size_small.description: The 1st menu item in Text menu, meaning small text size.

size_normal.description: The 2nd menu item in Text menu, meaning normal text size.

size_large.description: The 3rd menu item in Text menu, meaning large text size.

size_huge.description: The 4th menu item in Text menu, meaning huge text size.

line.description: The 4th button in image editing toolbar, meaning draw a line in the image.

edit_tip.message: Below is the screenshot you captured. You can edit it with the tools on the left. Press Save when finished.

quality_setting.description: The 1st sub-title in the Option page.

save_setting.description: The 2nd sub-title in the Option page.

save_tip.description: Tip before the save location edit box

autosave.message: Autosave - after capture, bypass editing screen and directly save the captured image to the default location with the web page title as default file name

set_save_path.description: Browse button, meaning open a browsing dialog to set the save location.

open_save_path.description: Go to folder button, meaning open the save location.

save_and_close.description: Save and close button on the option page
